A careless admin reused a prime while generating RSA keys for two users. Can you recover the message? Ciphertext: ciphertext1: 459608532278870851598079706081326208206100072125556559216186474384710582876466691862380697687470363670209640544203116763743244384468897444092909208825915948745608965622325454384112746138985767403860744290031206082689417201490253127, ciphertext2: 331798068618646810224487677673024077018375542967812020611005922626367791099704355887366554372788512896596922947050722542835330329058614604462119511359227789354302150142140017537111672974737304273810668634449623063880550983405885294

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=827631494345253718611290446955746565763003338176250634568444241007603368088248449514538456240984139017950408837802807943773881747100913320108735224606378636959818697007588672968357502159217829228642509481814490245317252178226425153, n2=1162732021393884377977637825672773759802229277464285008645703883837496423054361820083750879448097246333209959430613813190777461566081823924270546286801355516578905306245531779351527700041291544108989536744359246348875910643358390543, e=253656782712141424247572503456265044837168515144500132877243480780227921546208445035861837799620429541438119163009243448472201766851060927400062973251116153987423262705812730018756079401518566295898206056850268477230699720243123609

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{vzlb1jr9}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 459608532278870851598079706081326208206100072125556559216186474384710582876466691862380697687470363670209640544203116763743244384468897444092909208825915948745608965622325454384112746138985767403860744290031206082689417201490253127, ciphertext2: 331798068618646810224487677673024077018375542967812020611005922626367791099704355887366554372788512896596922947050722542835330329058614604462119511359227789354302150142140017537111672974737304273810668634449623063880550983405885294
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=827631494345253718611290446955746565763003338176250634568444241007603368088248449514538456240984139017950408837802807943773881747100913320108735224606378636959818697007588672968357502159217829228642509481814490245317252178226425153, n2=1162732021393884377977637825672773759802229277464285008645703883837496423054361820083750879448097246333209959430613813190777461566081823924270546286801355516578905306245531779351527700041291544108989536744359246348875910643358390543, e=253656782712141424247572503456265044837168515144500132877243480780227921546208445035861837799620429541438119163009243448472201766851060927400062973251116153987423262705812730018756079401518566295898206056850268477230699720243123609
extra_info: p=25807474426187581804483311731674709194843176666216665638757121196963243765962324559326521765635251068433532468021811, q=32069449364848828056749961515788507541558952127502789101716873234177073623882634916484872471869174984836683660238523, r=36256688044926317117799374340601122679078830959718157404626684869392358251542522416762659011404749485886270410615741, φ(n1)=827631494345253718611290446955746565763003338176250634568444241007603368088248449514538456240984139017950408837802750066850090710691052086835487761389642234831024977552848198973926361841827984269166698087576985819263981962098164820, φ(n2)=1162732021393884377977637825672773759802229277464285008645703883837496423054361820083750879448097246333209959430613744864640051790936649374934689897171134878795818085299025435793424130609416118951656289212875972424405187689287536280
